channel.title: GCSE GRAPHICS - Blister Pack!
channel.description:
Well, Tbhz, I'm a nub. I'm taking gcse graphics, and for a piece of coursework, we had to Design and Create a blister pack. We haven't started making, but this is my main design. For those of you that don't know, a blister pack is a kind of packaging that a product might come in. It consists of a piece of vacuum formed plastic, and some card. Quite simple really. Because I'm such a loser, I based mine on runescape. Here's my work so far:
[img]http://i23.tinypic.com/2sb3gn6.png[/img]
I'd really appreciate some CC, and some ideas for the headerrr.
DANKE! :D
Jamesy x

item.title: GCSE GRAPHICS - Blister Pack!
item.dc:creator: @JV1 JV
item.description:
@JV1 wrote:

[quote=“goatee, post:9, topic:150945”]GCSE graphics is nothing to do with this type of graphics. Cept the tiny bit of design you may do, but your not going to need photoshop for it.

It’s alright cept the text.[/quote]

We use photoshop in an awful lot of our projects. I go to a technology college, and the course i’m taking is Computer & Graphic Design. Alot of which is based around web design, packaging, product design, marketing etc. And I back up killerman on the statement that graphics can mean all sorts of things

And I thought the text matched the design. Note, the image is better quality than this. ;]

Read full topic

Other than that, move the hanger thing to the top, and round it off.

Well done overall :).[/quote]

It cuts off at the top because I haven’t finished it yet ahah
Thanks for your heelp

I need some ideas for the top?
